attributes.action: Alert the International Media about what is going on in South Africa.
attributes.background: Publicise the growing unrest in South Africa, people have no food, medication, petrol.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about what news to report is a matter for individual news organisations, not the Government or House of Commons.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Take action to support South African citizens/British nationals in South Africa: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592030
